assignPublicIp.description:
Assign a public IP address to the ENI (Fargate launch type only). Valid values are `true` or `false`. Default `false`.

For more information, see the [Task Networking](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECS/latest/developerguide/task-networking.html) documentation.

securityGroups.description: Security groups associated with the task or service. If you do not specify a security group, the default security group for the VPC is used.

subnets.description: Subnets associated with the task or service.
